3 PidController::PidController(float Kp, float Ki, float Kd, float tolerance)
4  : Kp_(Kp), Ki_(Ki), Kd_(Kd), tolerance_(tolerance)
5 {
6  total_error_ = 0;
7  previous_error_ = 0;
8 }

10 void PidController::setLimit(double lower, double upper)
11 {
12  lower_limit_ = lower;

16 float PidController::limit(float term)
17 {
18  if (term < lower_limit_)
19  {
20  return lower_limit_;
21  }
22  else if (term > upper_limit_)
23  {
24  return upper_limit_;
25  }
26  return term;
27 }
28 
29 void PidController::control(float &var, float error)
30 {
31  float pidterm;
32  if (error < tolerance_)
33  {
34  total_error_ = 0;
35  }
36  total_error_ += error;
37  pidterm = error * Kp_ + total_error_ * Ki_ + (error - previous_error_) * Kd_;
38  previous_error_ = error;
39  var = limit(pidterm);
40 }
